channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-14456] Modifier 'static' is redundant for inner enums
item.description: Java enumeration type is a static constant, implicitly modified with static final,Modifier 'static' is redundant for inner enums less.So I suggest deleting the 'static' modifier.
item.summary: Modifier 'static' is redundant for inner enums

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
